original_title: André Hazes: Live In Concertgebouw Amsterdam 1982
overview: On December 28, 1982, André Hazes enters the stage of the Royal Concertgebouw, a hall normally reserved for classical music. Hazes reached superstar status a year earlier with the album Simply André, which takes first place in the album chart and the hits 'A little love', 'Say nothing more', 'No streamers on the wall for me', 'It last round' and 'She believes in me'.
title: André Hazes: Live In Concertgebouw Amsterdam 1982
